message: Starting analysis of current health monitoring implementation to design active daemon
Analyzed current implementation: Health checks only run passively in get_real_task_status. Need active daemon that periodically scans all tasks and marks dead agents as failed

Created orchestrator/health_daemon.py (450 lines) with comprehensive HealthDaemon class. Features: background thread monitoring, tmux/PID checks, stuck detection, automatic failure marking with LockedRegistryFile
Added health daemon imports to real_mcp_server.py. Now integrating daemon registration in create_real_task and kill_real_task functions for automatic monitoring

PHASE 3 IMPLEMENTATION COMPLETE: Successfully designed and implemented active health monitoring daemon with comprehensive features. Created orchestrator/health_daemon.py (450 lines), integrated into real_mcp_server.py, and provided test_health_daemon.py for validation. System now proactively monitors all agents and auto-marks failures.
